llm.feedback:
Up | 3–12 month window | Regime 2 (upside/easing acceleration) triggered by a dovish Jackson Hole read and faster disinflation; watch for a sharp drop in real yields and a firmer risk-on bid as the dollar weakens, with AI/tech-led equities benefiting from cross-asset flows confirming the regime shift, Tencent's earnings backdrop and energy dynamics feeding risk premia, and a shift in cross-market implied vol that tilts toward compression, while the path remains contingent on policy expectations and external balance signals (GX057ADL7)(37UZC9X8I) | Probability 30%
Up | 0–6 month window | ACMR and broader risk assets re-rate higher if rate cuts materialize and IPO momentum remains supportive; watch the September 50bp cut and roughly 150bp of easing by year-end, plus the IPO cadence, which together could lift ACMR toward the high-30s to low-40s as 2025 guidance and the 2028 revenue target underscore the path (C22MKA9VY)(Q7VVGNSQE)(SK994CBWR) | Probability 50%
Down | 6–12 month window | Regime 3 via inflation surprises or external shocks—sanctions, export controls, or energy constraints reprice risk premia and lift the dollar; watch the energy backdrop with IEA signals and geopolitical frictions as these can blunt risk assets and widen credit spreads, potentially triggering broader risk-off across equities and fixed income and forcing liquidity dynamics to reprice exposure (GX057ADL7)(J99EM2TPZ) | Probability 25%
Down | 0–3 month window | BOJ wage-growth dynamics or a misread U.S. rate-cut path could tilt yields higher and trigger risk-off in rate-sensitive names; watch BOJ communications and the trajectory of U.S. rate-cut expectations against data resilience to gauge near-term cross-asset volatility and the durability of any pockets of momentum in rate-sensitive equities (K0WFSW29E)(H9WSBYP3D) | Probability 40%
